thread.title_full: NEXCOM and ActiveScaler Explore the Future of the Connected Transportation at Integrate Conference

author: Khang Pham
title: NEXCOM and ActiveScaler Explore the Future of the Connected Transportation at Integrate Conference
text:
NEXCOM and ActiveScaler will be collaborating to explore the future of the next generation of connected vehicles at Integrate Conference, co-located with DataWeek and API World, from September 28-30, 2015 at the Santa Clara Convention Center in California. NEXCOM, a company focused on high quality hardware development for connected transportation systems, and ActiveScaler, a real-time automotive data platform for the transportation industry, are focusing to provide a complete solution for the transportation industry to offer safer and more efficient operations, simplify complex application integration for businesses, and redefine the future of the connected transportation industry.
NEXCOM has recently introduced in-vehicle computers VTC 7230 and VTC 7240. Featuring 5th generation Intel® Core™ processors, the in-vehicle computers boast numerous telematics features to support advanced fleet management, security features to protect vehicles in harsh environments, and performance to drive ADAS (Advanced Driver Assistance Systems) and stream multiple video surveillance feeds. VTC series products have integrated mobile communication and navigation capabilities e.g. GSM, GPRS, UMTS, HSDPA and GPS; Mini-PCI express WLAN/ WWAN; CAN bus or other I/O interfaces and Optional IP65 enclosure to enhances the systems ruggedness.
ActiveScaler provides a real-time, scalable “InMotion Cloud” solution that empowers connected vehicle application developers to create apps by providing real-time data access, location services and control capability via secure and powerful APIs.
By 2020, it is estimated that global market revenue for connected vehicle technologies will range from $150-$190 billion, creating an industry dedicated to creating cutting edge solutions for manufacturers.
At the core of both companies’ partnership is to provide safety, productivity, intelligence and efficiency for the connected vehicle business eco-system. NEXCOM’ high performance design, certified products, global presence and distribution capability is helping worldwide transportation clients. ActiveScaler’s platform is supporting the secure integration with NEXCOM device to provide data from large number of internal vehicle sensors, making it available to enterprise applications in real-time, and enables contextual actionable intelligence for businesses worldwide.
Both ActiveScaler and NEXCOM will have their respective technologies on display in their booth #513 at Integrate Conference, co-located with DataWeek and API World, at Santa Clara Convention Center, from September 28-30, 2015.
About ActiveScaler
ActiveScaler provides a real-time data platform for the transportation industry to connect vehicles to the cloud in real-time while protecting user privacy and enhancing overall scalability and security. Our highly scalable “InMotion Cloud” solution is empowering connected vehicle application developers to create amazing applications by providing real-time time data access, location services, and control capability via secure and powerful APIs. Our core value proposition is to make this platform secure, scalable to provide internal sensor data and contextual control capabilities. ActiveScaler is based in Silicon Valley and have offices in Noida, India and Shenzhen, China.
About NEXCOM
Founded in 1992, NEXCOM integrates its capabilities and operates six global businesses, which are Multi-Media Solutions, Mobile Computing Solutions, IoT Automation Solutions, Network and Communication Solutions, Intelligent Digital Security, and Medical and Healthcare Informatics. NEXCOM serves its customers worldwide through its subsidiaries in five major industrial countries. Under the IoT megatrend, NEXCOM expands its offerings with solutions in emerging applications including IoT, robotics, connected cars, Industry 4.0, and industrial security.
